definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The Little Princess Dress also comes with a matching cone style hat.
sentences.chinese: 小公主裙还带有一个锥气势派头匹配的饰品。

sentences.english: Masterful Scorpio should make a good mate for quiet spoken Cancer.
sentences.chinese: 主任派头的天蝎会是寡言少语巨蟹的好伴侣。

sentences.english: He has the typical reportorial manner.
sentences.chinese: 他有一种典型的记者派头。

sentences.english: Can't you see he just wants to play the aristocrat?
sentences.chinese: 你看不出他就是想扮出一副贵族派头吗？

definition: way of doing sth/behavior/to act in an affected manner/mannerism/gestures in opera
to put on airs/to be ostentatious
ostentation/a show of extravagance/grand style/red tape
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
to put on airs/to assume great airs
stinking pretension/to give oneself airs and offend others/hateful arrogance
